tooltip: Select Mido, the Kokiri Chief, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Mido focuses on improving Cavalry units.
Allows you to summon Mido, a Melee cavalry hero.
Cavalry unit that can loose Slingshots while on the move.
Chiefs are trained as Mounted Cavalry units and can attach to Cavalry Battalions.
Improves the speed of all Cavalry units.
